summary: A utility module that creates compact thumbnail previews for a broad spectrum of media files. It loads the source content using appropriate libraries (image, video, audio, PDF, 3D, RAW, etc.), processes it with scaling, cropping, color adjustments, overlays, gradients, masks, and icons, and returns Qt-compatible image objects for display in the application.
business_intent: Enable fast visual identification and browsing of media assets within the TagStudio application by generating consistent, lightweight preview images for all supported file formats.
